Soumaya Akaaboune (a mụrụ na 16 Febụwarị 1974) bụ onye mba  Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Tangier, Morocco, nne Akaaboune bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na onye na-ese ejiji ebe nna ya bụ onye hụrụ nka n'anya
Ọ kọwara ụlọ ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata dịka ebe nsọ maka ndị na-ese ihe na ndị nọ ná mkpa
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, onye na-ede egwu Maurice Bejart hụrụ Akaaboune, onye kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye n'òtù ịgba egwu ya
Ọ nabatara ma zụọ maka awa asatọ n'ụbọchị, oge o kwuru na ọ bụ onye kacha nwee obi ụtọ na ndụ ya. Akaaboune gara Europe, na-agba egwu na Paris, mgbe ahụ Spain na London

N'oge ọ nọ na London, ọ tụgharịrị uche ya na ihe nkiri, na-eme ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ egwu. Ọ gbajiri akwara Achilles ya n'afọ 1989, na-eme ka ọrụ ịgba egwú ya kwụsị. Na London, Akaaboune zutere Sandra Bernhard, onye kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ihe ngosi ya "Up All Night" ma mesịa mee ihe ngosi Broadway "I'm Still Here"...Ọ katọrọ ya".
Akaaboune zụrụ ime ihe nkiri na Loft Studio

N'afọ 2010, ya na Matt Damon gbara na ihe nkiri Green Zone Akaaboune nwere ọrụ na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Playing for Keeps n'afọ 2012 na ihe nkiri Lovelace n'afọ 2013. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị inyom ise na-elekọta ụlọ gosipụtara na 2013 French show Les Vraies Housewives N'agbata afọ 2015 na 2016, Akaaboune gosipụtara dịka Fettouma na ihe nkiri ncha a ma ama Wadii, nke Yassine Ferhanne duziri
Omume ya bụ nwanyị ọgaranya nke jụrụ ịnabata ikpe na-ezighị ezi, ihe ngosi ahụ nwetakwara nde mmadụ 7 kwa ihe omume. N'afọ 2019, ọ gbara Marcelle na usoro TV The Spy
Akaaboune zutere onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Peter Rodger n'afọ 1999
Ha abụọ mechara lụọ di ma mụọ nwa nwoke, Jazz

Akaaboune bụ nne nkuchi Elliot Rodger, onye mere ogbugbu nke 2014 Isla Vista. Ha abụọ nwere mmekọrịta na-adịghị mma, Rodger mekwara atụmatụ igbu Akaaboune. Ọ laghachiri Morocco na ngwụcha afọ 2014. Akaaboune na-asụ French, Arabic, English na Spanish.
